ygData.subject: Re: Shark attack/Ragnar/Katya
ygData.msgSnippet: Fury finds his gun and picks it up, very frustrated.  Man, this guy just don t quit! Just shut up and blast him! Riekan grunts.  The two of them point and

Fury finds his gun and picks it up, very frustrated.  "Man, this guy 
just don't quit!"  

"Just shut up and blast him!" Riekan grunts.  The two of them point 
and shoot ...

Pumpskin seems to be quite settled down now, except for his tendency 
to consider everything in life to be a joke.  "Why not?" he 
sniggers.  "After all, someone seems to be in trouble over there."  
He points at Ragnar, who's about to get zapped.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Being down on his back, Ragnar takes the kick and starts rolling 
away 
> on his side when he sees the gun's muzzle bearing down on him. He 
> stops just after he avoided the shots, but his arm hurt and he 
tries 
> to stand up. Also, with the venom in him, he starts to see in a 
> blurred way.
> 
> Ragnar: Kup, Rodimus, Windlord, anyone... I am going down. I need 
> backup now!
> 
> Blackfang held his hand at Katya. She understood the motion and 
stood 
> there, with her aim steady.
> 
> Blackfang: How about you join us? We are brothers in arms after 
all...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Ragnar neglected to take into account the weapon's rapid motion - 
> the 
> > slug misses the lashknife and goes straight to Fury, rocking the 
> > smaller warrior.  Riekan kicks at Ragnar, hoping to drive him 
back a 
> > bit, and fires again.
> > 
> > The shots pepper Pumpskin's hide, but fail to 
penetrate.  'Relative' 
> > leaves a lot open, and the warrior's weak points are still 
tough.  
> > When he hears what Blackfang has to say, he stops and thinks 
about 
> > it.  "You know, that's a very good point.  Why am I doing this?"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > Ragnar raised his arm and the harpoon exploded. A searing burn 
ran 
> > > across his arm, but he managed to twist enough to fire his 
Gauss 
> at 
> > > Fury. The slug went straight at the knife, which would break 
> > > inevitably, and past it at Fury.
> > > 
> > > The blond Clansman looked at his limb and saw it in a bloddy 
> > metallic 
> > > mess. Adrenaline was still high, but he would not last.
> > > 
> > > Katya saw a breach and fired between the tentacles.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang leaped back and out of most of the tentacles way. 
> > However, 
> > > his shotgun was taken out of his grip. He drew his pulse laser 
and 
> > > fired small quick shots as near as he could to the gash.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Why the hell are you doing this then? You're on our 
> side!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > > > Riekan takes the hit, all right, but he's sturdy enough to 
> > maintain 
> > > > his point-blank position long enough to fire his harpoon 
gun.  
> At 
> > > > this range, Ragnar could be ripped wide open by such a 
blast.  
> > Fury 
> > > > whirls his blade, waiting for another opening.
> > > > 
> > > > Most of the fire impacts on Pumpskin's self-regenerating 
limbs, 
> > but 
> > > > Blackfang scores a solid body hit with his last shot - and 
this 
> > > wound 
> > > > doesn't close itself up right away, betraying the relative 
> > > > vulnerability of his torso.
> > > > 
> > > > "Hee hee, you're a perceptive one!" Pumpskin chuckles as he 
> > flails 
> > > in 
> > > > both directions, looking to give each of them a two-tentacle 
> > hug.  
> > > > All four appendages stretch out to their maximum length again.
